caption.title: Selection of public health facilities and numbers of patients on ART, Kinshasa 2015.
caption.p: (a) Antiretroviral treatment (ART) facilities in Kinshasa. Out of 35 existing health zones in Kinshasa, the two zones managed by the police and the military, serving 1187 patients, were excluded before analysis. (b) ART facilities included in the study. All high-burden facilities were targeted, and a purposive sample of low-burden facilities, including for each health zone the largest facility with 100â€“200 patients and the largest facility with < 100 patients.
